title: Marshal

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, you may start a Tribunal (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Tribunals change the voting system to a military tribunal
- When a player reaches a majority vote during the tribunal, they will be executed. This does not end the day.
- There may be 3 executions during a tribunal.
- Players executed during a Tribunal will not have their roles or wills revealed until the Tribunal is over.
- During a Tribunal, you have one extra vote.
- Your role will be publicly revealed when you use your ability.

desc:
Post 4741
*I changed this so it fits GIM's voting system*
